questions.question: Leaf Area Index is a dimensionless quantity. Say True or False.

explanations.a: Correct Answer. Leaf Area Index is a dimensionless quantity.
explanations.b: Leaf Area Index is a dimensionless quantity.

explanations.a: Dense conifer forests has high LAI
explanations.b: Dense conifer forests has high LAI

explanations.d: Correct Answer. Dense conifer forests has high LAI

questions.question: LAI varies with seasonal changes in plant activity. Say True or False

explanations.a: Correct Answer. LAI varies with seasonal changes in plant activity.
explanations.b: LAI varies with seasonal changes in plant activity.
